scripts.dev: docker exec -it resolver-api npx nodemon src/server.ts
scripts.build: docker exec -t resolver-api npx tsc && docker exec -t resolver-api npx tsc-alias && docker exec -t resolver-api npx cpy specs/* ./dist
scripts.start: docker exec -it resolver-api npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/server
scripts.serve: docker exec -it resolver-api bash -c 'npx redocly build-docs ./specs/spec.yml -o ./specs/public/index.html && npx tsc && npx tsc-alias && npx cpy specs/* .env.* ./dist && node -r tsconfig-paths/register dist/src/server.js'
scripts.build-local: npx tsc && npx tsc-alias && npx cpy .env.dev specs/* ./dist
scripts.serve-local: bash -c 'npx redocly build-docs ./specs/spec.yml -o ./specs/public/index.html && npx tsc && npx tsc-alias && npx cpy specs/* .env.* ./dist && NODE_ENV=development node -r tsconfig-paths/register dist/src/server.js'
scripts.openapi:build: docker exec -t resolver-api npx redocly build-docs ./specs/spec.yml -o ./specs/public/index.html
